oai_dc:dc.dc:title: BODIPY based fluorescent chemodosimeter for explosive picric acid in aqueous media and rapid detection in the solid state
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MADHU, S
BANDELA, A
RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: NITROAROMATIC EXPLOSIVES
CHEMOSENSORS
SENSORS
POLYMER
DYES
TNT
DIPYRROMETHENES
REAGENTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A novel fluorescent chemodosimeter, for specific recognition of explosive picric acid over other nitroaromatic compounds, was developed. It was also demonstrated for the first time that the reported chemodosimeter can selectively detect picric acid, both in solution and solid state.
